projects.title: Bug Tracker
projects.description: An app used for creating tickets and managing projects and users working on those projects.

tickets.title: Allow to order by columns in ticket filter
Add pagination to ticket filter
By default do not show completed tickets in ticket filter
Improve security for sign in
tickets.content: Should have a session or something similar on signing in so this can be checked and will prevent being able to sign through the url params.

tickets.title: Have a link to create tickets from the project page
tickets.content: This should also set the project Id to already be set from the project it was just previously on. For an example when creating a ticket from the project with name "A" it should set that ticket's project Id to "A" in the create form by default.

tickets.title: Display warning when due date is passed current date
tickets.content: This can possible display a warning when the current date is near the due date as well

tickets.title: Display popup when creating/updating data
tickets.content: This can be like a popup that is displayed somewhere at the top of the screen to let the user know that the data has been successfully updated

tickets.title: Implement role functionality for users
tickets.content: Roles should remove/add features to users depending on the current role they have like for an example, a developer shouldn't be able to create users but an admin should be able to create users.

tickets.title: Remove userId param from workspace url
tickets.content: This isn't needed anymore since sessions can be used for getting the user id with session id

tickets.title: Highlight the nav link that page is currently on
tickets.content: Have the nav link in the side nav to be highlighted depending on the page its on. Remix has a component for this called NavLink which could be useful for this. Try to get the dropdowns to be highlighted depending on the current page too.

tickets.title: Fix error when opening create ticket page when no projects are available.
tickets.content: When opening the create ticket page when there are no projects, it would throw an error of getting undefined when accessing id.

tickets.title: Display a footer in the workspace layout
Allow to set tickets as completed from ticket filter
Migrate completed ticket status to be closed
tickets.content: Instead of the completed ticket status, have a boolean of isClosed for tickets

tickets.title: Change icons for side nav links
tickets.content: All the icons in the side nav bar are the same when that same icon should only be used for the Dashboard while the rest of the dropdown texts should have their own icon

tickets.title: Display tag for closed tickets and allow to display closed tickets in ticket filter
tickets.content: In ticket filter display a tag next to the title to show that it is closed

tickets.title: Display charts with stats in project details page
tickets.content:
Have some charts that display:
- A donut chart to display amount of total open tickets and tickets for each priority level and possibly another for status of tickets
- Another donut chart for displaying total open tickets but instead for ticket statuses instead of priority

action.data:
Have some charts that display:
- A donut chart to display amount of total open tickets and tickets for each priority level and possibly another for status of tickets
- Another donut chart for displaying total open tickets but instead for ticket statuses instead of priority

history.previousValue:
Have some charts that display:
- A donut chart to display amount of total open tickets and tickets for each priority level and possibly another for status of tickets

tickets.title: Allow to close tickets in ticket page
Have ticket filter options stored as search params in url
Display charts with stats in dashboard
tickets.content:
Charts to have:
- A pie chart for all open tickets by priority
- A pie chart for all open tickets by ticket status
- A bar graph to display users to open tickets ratio per project

tickets.title: Add closedDate property for tickets
tickets.content: When tickets are closed, this will set the closedDate
